name: Action
description: Anime with the main elements of aggressive form of activity, such as fightning, violence and destruction.

name: Adventure
description: Anime with settings that are unusual or exciting.

name: Chibi
description: Anime title which include characters drawn in the in super deformed style with small bodies and large heads.

name: Children's Show
description: Anime by nature is targeted towards younger viewers, but this genre label refers to titles who are targeted to children in grade school or younger. They could, but not always, be educational in nature.

name: Comedy
description: Anime that targets the viewers to laugh and be amused.

name: Drama
description: Anime that draws viewers into life-like drama where it significantly draws feelings out from viewers.

name: Ecchi
description: Anime titles with great deal of fanservice, generally has girls in suggestive positions and skimpy clothing. If you see panty shots, then it can probably be considered ecchi.

name: Fantasy
description: Anime that has the aspect of dreams, magic or anything that is out of the ordinary in real life.

name: Gender-Switch
description: Anime title in which main character(s) are ‘transformed’ to the opposing gender or are cross-dressing.

name: Harem
description: Anime that portrays the main character, usually male, has multiple romantic interests who compete for his affection.

name: Horror
description: Anime that involves blood, violence and gory things that all combined will moderately scare the viewers.

name: Lolicon
description: Anime characters who's got a Lolita-complex, younger/under-age girls are exploited in a more erotic/romantic vision and story.

name: Mecha
description: Anime with elements of war in the context of robots and mechanical weapons.

name: Mystery
description: Anime that are often seen with detectives, spies and mysterious cases to be solved

name: Psychological
description: Anime that may be a little disturbing when it comes to mind-games between characters.

name: Romance
description: Anime that are mainly focused on love and relationship between characters.

name: School Life
description: Anime that has settings in school grounds.

name: Shoujo
description: Anime that includes almost anything from romance and drama to action to comedy. Its primary distinguishing factor is its focus on the characters and the relationships between them.

name: Shounen
description: Anime that includes almost anything from romance and drama to action to comedy. Its primary distinguishing factor is its focus on the characters and the relationships between them.

name: Slap-Stick
description: Anime that are far or less comedy-like but are a little more far-fetched when it comes to the characters trying to implement common sense.

name: Yaoi
description: Anime with a Japanese term refering to anime which contain male homosexual themes. Yaoi typically refers to titles with sexually explicit material while Shounen-Ai (Boy Love) refers to those that do not.

name: Yuri
description: Anime with  a Japanese term refering to anime which contain female homosexual themes. Yuri typically refers to titles with sexually explicit material while Shojo-Ai (Girl Love) refers to those that do not.
